transcript.message: Hello James, this is Sarah calling from Tangerine Bank. Do you have a moment to talk?
Oh, hi Sarah. Yeah, I have a few minutes. Is this about my credit card?
Yes, I'm calling to check in about your account. I noticed there's a payment that's a bit past due, and I wanted to reach out to see how we can help.
Yeah, I know. Look, I got laid off from my job about two months ago. I was working at the auto plant, but they had layoffs. I've been looking for work but it's been tough.
I'm really sorry to hear that, James. Losing a job is incredibly stressful, and I appreciate you sharing that with me. How are you holding up?
It's been hard, honestly. I have some savings but they're running low. I've had a few interviews though, so I'm hopeful something will come through soon.
That sounds really challenging, and I'm glad you're staying positive about the job search. Let's see what we can do to help make this more manageable for you.
I want to pay, I really do. I just can't afford the full amount right now. Maybe I could do something smaller?
Absolutely, we can work with that. Given your situation, I can offer you a reduced payment plan. Would something like $50 a month work for you until you're back on your feet?
Fifty dollars? Yeah, I think I can manage that. When would that start?
We can start it on the first of next month. That gives you a couple of weeks to prepare. I'll also make a note about your job situation so if you need to adjust later, we have that context.
That would be great. Thank you for being understanding about this. I was worried you'd be demanding the full amount.
Not at all, James. We're here to help you through this. Once you find a new job, we can revisit the payment amount if you'd like to pay it off faster.
Sounds good. I actually have a second interview at a logistics company next week. If I get that job, I'll definitely increase my payments.
That's wonderful news! Good luck with the interview. So just to confirm - we're setting up a $50 monthly payment plan starting on February 15th. Is that correct?
Yes, that works for me. Can I pay by bank transfer?
Absolutely. I'll set that up for you. You'll receive an email confirmation with all the details. Is there anything else I can help you with today?
No, that's all. Thanks again, Sarah. I really appreciate your help.
You're very welcome, James. Best of luck with your interview, and don't hesitate to reach out if your situation changes. Take care!
